title: Australia news live: Islamophobia envoy hands down 54 recommendations spanning ‘every major agency in government’
summary: Could you please provide the news article you'd like summarized?

title: Country diary: Half a century of watching this river change | Phil Gates
summary: In Witton-le-Wear, County Durham, a diverse collection of both exotic and native plants is on display. This unique assortment is constantly evolving. Visitors can expect the plant selection to change over time.

title: Charlie Kirk shooting: new video of suspect released by FBI amid urgent appeal for help from the public
summary: The FBI has announced a $100,000 reward and is appealing to the public for assistance in identifying the killer of a Trump ally. This move highlights ongoing challenges faced by law enforcement in solving the case. The situation underscores the complexities surrounding investigations involving high-profile individuals.

title: Utah officials share video of Charlie Kirk shooting suspect as governor pledges death penalty - live
summary: Authorities held a briefing after releasing four new images of a suspect. A reward of $100,000 has been offered for information leading to the suspect's capture. The community is urged to assist in the investigation.

title: Envoy decries ‘lack of action’ on persistent Islamophobia in Australia and calls for tracking of hate crimes
summary: Aftab Malik released a report with 54 recommendations, highlighting concerns over bomb threats and assaults. These issues underline the urgent need for improved safety measures. The report aims to address vulnerabilities and enhance security protocols.
